title: Landing Page Renders Successfully
description: Verify that the home route '/' renders without client-side errors or console warnings
steps: Check for JavaScript errors in console

title: Hero Section Displays Correctly
description: Verify Hero section displays headline, subheadline, and primary CTA linking to /contact
steps: Check primary CTA button exists and links to /contact

title: Social Proof Logos Display
description: Verify social proof section displays at least 4 logos with non-empty alt text
steps: Verify each logo has alt text

title: Services Cards Display and Navigate
description: Verify services section displays at least 3 cards, each clickable and focusable
steps: Verify each card has title, description, and icon
Test keyboard navigation to each card

title: Technology Stack Display
description: Verify technology stack lists at least 6 technologies with accessible labels

title: Case Study Spotlight
description: Verify case study section includes KPI tile and deep-link to /case-studies/techflow
steps: Check deep-link to case study page

title: Testimonials Display
description: Verify testimonials contain at least 2 entries with names and roles
steps: Verify each has author name, role, and company

title: CTA Section Button
description: Verify CTA section displays button linking to /contact

title: Navigation Functionality
description: Verify navigation is visible, sticky, and contains all required links
steps: Verify navigation is visible at top
Scroll down and verify navigation remains sticky
Check all links: Home, Services, Portfolio, About, Contact

title: Footer Renders Correctly
description: Verify footer renders with site links and copyright

title: Contact Form Multi-Step Flow
description: Verify contact form progresses through all 4 steps correctly

title: Form Validation
description: Verify contact form validation using Zod schema
steps: Try to proceed without selecting service
Enter less than 20 characters in project details

title: Skip Link Functionality
description: Verify skip link is first tab stop and jumps to main content
steps: Verify focus moves to main content

title: Keyboard Navigation
description: Verify all interactive elements are keyboard accessible
steps: Use Tab key to navigate through all interactive elements

title: ARIA Labels and Landmarks
description: Verify proper ARIA labels and HTML5 landmarks
steps: Verify header, main, footer landmarks exist

title: Color Contrast Ratio
description: Verify text/background contrast meets WCAG AA standards (≥ 4.5:1 for normal text, ≥ 3:1 for large text)

title: Image Alt Text
description: Verify all images have appropriate alt text
steps: Verify meaningful images have descriptive alt
Verify decorative images have empty alt
Check logo alt text in social proof

title: Reduced Motion Support
description: Verify animations respect prefers-reduced-motion
steps: Verify animations are disabled or reduced

title: Heading Hierarchy
description: Verify proper heading structure with one unique h1
steps: Verify logical heading order (h1, h2, h3, etc.)

title: Mobile Menu Accessibility
description: Verify mobile menu is keyboard accessible with focus trap
steps: Verify focus trap when menu is open
Verify focus returns to menu button

title: Largest Contentful Paint (LCP)
description: Verify LCP ≤ 2.5s on throttled mobile (Fast 3G or 4G Slow)

title: Cumulative Layout Shift (CLS)
description: Verify CLS ≤ 0.1 with no late layout shifts
steps: Check for layout shifts during logo loads
Verify no shifts in hero section

title: Interaction to Next Paint (INP)
description: Verify INP ≤ 200ms on mobile

title: JavaScript Bundle Size
description: Verify JS bundle for landing route ≤ 150KB gzipped
steps: Check gzipped size of main bundle

title: Image Optimization
description: Verify all images use next/image with static dimensions
steps: Verify lazy loading for off-screen images

title: Meta Tags Present
description: Verify title, description, OpenGraph, and Twitter Card tags are present
steps: Check OpenGraph tags (og:title, og:description, og:type, og:url)

title: Heading Structure
description: Verify one unique h1 and semantic heading order

title: External Link Security
description: Verify external links have rel='noopener noreferrer'
steps: Verify rel='noopener noreferrer' on target='_blank' links

title: No Sensitive Data Exposure
description: Verify no PII or sensitive data in landing page source
steps: Verify no API keys in client code
Check console for logged sensitive data

title: Form Security
description: Verify contact form has proper validation and sanitization

title: Mobile Layout (375px)
description: Verify layout works correctly on mobile devices (iPhone SE, etc.)

title: Tablet Layout (768px - 1024px)
description: Verify layout works correctly on tablet devices

title: Desktop Layout (1440px - 1920px)
description: Verify layout works correctly on desktop displays
steps: Verify content is centered and readable
